name: Timmy! Bag and run
description:
This project it's a microgame made in three days. Timmy! Bag and run it's a side runner with spooky aesthetic. Controls: A and D to move, SPACE to disappear. 

Made by:

 -Júlia Camba : Designer & Level Desgin, 3D Art

-Germán Bueno  : 3D Artist, Programmer.

:)
